channel.title: How do you make a "owner has logged on message" at start up
channel.description: okay, i know im new. but i need some help. i dont know how to word this correctly, but how do you make it to where when you start up your server, and when the owner logs on, it will say "owner and coder "yourname" logged in"?

item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

And you put that in initialize() in your client class, incase you didn’t know.

item.title: How do you make a "owner has logged on message" at start up
item.dc:creator: @_JAGEX1 _JAGEX_
item.description:
@_JAGEX1 wrote:

Ok, so if you are using a 317 source what I am guessing. Then open your source folder up and search for client.java (it should look like notepad) Once you open that up hold in (Ctrl F) For a shortcut to find a word. Search for owner and coder now if it looks like this.if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

then that means you allready have it and all you need to do is go back to your source open up the characters folder and double click your user name.txt and Ctrl + F again and this time search for rights once you search for that delete the 0 and make it 3.
3 = owner-coowner
2 = hidin admin (i think)
1 = mod
0 = normal player

Ok, now if you didnt have that coding there for the player rights in client.java then go back to that and search NewHP = playerLevel
once you are there hit enter twice (make sure that your blinking curser is at the end of the word) then put this code in.if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged out"; }
And if you want all the rights like adminstrator had logged in mod logged in so on then put this code in.[code]if (playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Administrtor " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}

else if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
else if (playerRights == 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Player " +playerName+ " has logged in”;
}
}
else if (playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Administrtor " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if (playerRights == 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Player " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}[/code]

I Hope This Has Worked If Not Then I Dont No Whats Wrong Might Need To Get A New Source.
I Could Give You My Client.java But Dont No If It Will Work For Your Source.

Read full topic
